revised_title: New Observations on Pompey's Pillar in Egypt
tldr: Edward Wortley Montagu examines Pompey's Pillar in Egypt and discovers a hidden medal of Vespasian, suggesting that the pillar was erected in his honor rather than Pompey's. Montagu also notes the reversed hieroglyphics and the weak pedestal, which support his theory that the pillar was not from antiquity.
